description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，中共第二十届中央委员。因长期担任习近平的秘书，被外界视为习近平在军方的“幕僚长”。曾任中央军委办公厅主任、中央军委主席办公室主任、国防大学政委等职务。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the People's Liberation Army (PLA) and a member of the 20th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party. Regarded by the public as Xi Jinping's "chief of staff" in the military due to his long tenure as Xi's secretary. He has held positions such as Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission, Director of the Office of the Chairman of the Central Military Commission, and Political Commissar of the National Defence University.

en: Xi Jinping

description.zh-cn: 现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: Current General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

en: Kaihua County

description.zh-cn: 浙江省衢州市下辖县，钟绍军的出生地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Quzhou City, Zhejiang Province, and the birthplace of Zhong Shaojun.

en: Hangzhou University

description.zh-cn: 一所曾经位于中国杭州市的大学，1998年并入浙江大学。
description.en: A former university located in Hangzhou, China, which was merged into Zhejiang University in 1998.

en: Zhejiang University

description.zh-cn: 位于中国浙江省杭州市的综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province, China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党浙江省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党浙江省委员会
en: Zhejiang Provincial Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在浙江省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading party organ of the Chinese Communist Party in Zhejiang Province.

en: General Office of the Shanghai Municipal Committee of the CPC

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党上海市委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative body of the Shanghai Municipal Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

nodes.id: 中共中央办公厅调研室

zh-cn: 中共中央办公厅调研室
en: Research Office of the General Office of the CCP Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会办公厅内设机构。
description.en: An internal department of the General Office of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

nodes.id: 中央军事委员会办公厅

zh-cn: 中央军事委员会办公厅
en: General Office of the Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会的办事机构，负责处理中央军委的日常事务。
description.en: The administrative body of the Central Military Commission of the CCP, responsible for handling the daily affairs of the CMC.

en: Office of the Chairman of the Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 负责服务中央军委主席的机构。
description.en: The office responsible for serving the Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

nodes.id: 中央军委改革和编制办公室

zh-cn: 中央军委改革和编制办公室
en: Office for Reform and Organizational Structure of the Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 中央军事委员会的职能部门之一，负责军队的改革与编制工作。
description.en: One of the functional departments of the Central Military Commission, responsible for military reform and organizational structure.

nodes.id: 中央军委深化国防和军队改革领导小组办公室

zh-cn: 中央军委深化国防和军队改革领导小组办公室
en: Office of the Leading Group for Deepening National Defense and Military Reform of the CMC

description.zh-cn: 中央军委深化国防和军队改革领导小组的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative body for the Leading Group for Deepening National Defense and Military Reform of the Central Military Commission.

nodes.id: 中央军委深化国防和军队改革领导小组

zh-cn: 中央军委深化国防和军队改革领导小组
en: Leading Group for Deepening National Defense and Military Reform of the Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 负责深化国防和军队改革的议事协调机构。
description.en: The deliberative and coordinating body responsible for deepening national defense and military reform.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军选举委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军选举委员会
en: Election Committee of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 负责组织中国人民解放军选举全国人民代表大会代表的机构。
description.en: The body responsible for organizing the election of deputies from the People's Liberation Army to the National People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军国防大学

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军国防大学
en: PLA National Defence University

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的最高军事学府。
description.en: The highest military academic institution of the People's Liberation Army.

en: New Zhijiang Army

description.zh-cn: 指与中共中央总书记习近平在浙江省共事过的官员群体，被外界认为是其主要的政治派系。
description.en: Refers to a group of officials who worked with CCP General Secretary Xi Jinping in Zhejiang Province, considered by outside observers to be his main political faction.

en: People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要国家武装力量。
description.en: The principal military force of the People's Republic of China.

en: Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的创立者和执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会
en: 20th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产党第二十次全国代表大会选出的中央委员会。
description.en: The Central Committee elected by the 20th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会
en: 19th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党于2017年召开的全国代表大会。
description.en: The National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party held in 2017.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会
en: 13th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届国家最高权力机关。
description.en: The 13th national legislature of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中央军委办公厅主任，是钟绍军的前任。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army who previously served as the Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission, the predecessor to Zhong Shaojun.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，接替钟绍军出任中央军委办公厅主任。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the People's Liberation Army who succeeded Zhong Shaojun as the Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任中央军委主席胡锦涛办公室主任，是钟绍军在中央军委主席办公室主任职位上的前任。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the People's Liberation Army who served as the Director of the Office of CMC Chairman Hu Jintao, and was Zhong Shaojun's predecessor in the role of Director of the Office of the Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

en: Hu Jintao

description.zh-cn: 前中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 钟绍军自习近平在浙江省任职期间便开始在其手下工作，长期担任其贴身大秘，被外界视为习近平在军方的“幕僚长”。
description.en: Zhong Shaojun began working under Xi Jinping during Xi's tenure in Zhejiang Province and served as his long-term personal secretary, leading to him being regarded as Xi's "chief of staff" in the military.

description.zh-cn: 1990年毕业于杭州大学计算机系计算机应用专业，获学士学位。
description.en: Graduated in 1990 from the Department of Computer Science at Hangzhou University with a bachelor's degree in computer applications.

description.zh-cn: 1999年毕业于浙江大学，获应用心理学硕士学位。
description.en: Graduated from Zhejiang University in 1999 with a master's degree in applied psychology.

relationships.target: 中国共产党浙江省委员会

position.en: Deputy Head of the Organization Department

relationships.target: 中共中央办公厅调研室
中央军事委员会办公厅
中央军事委员会办公厅
中央军委改革和编制办公室
中央军委深化国防和军队改革领导小组办公室

relationships.source: 中央军委深化国防和军队改革领导小组办公室
relationships.target: 中央军委深化国防和军队改革领导小组

description.zh-cn: 中央军委深化国防和军队改革领导小组办公室是该领导小组的办事机构。
description.en: The Office of the Leading Group for Deepening National Defense and Military Reform serves as the administrative body for the Leading Group.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军选举委员会
中国人民解放军国防大学

description.zh-cn: 钟绍军被外界广泛认为是习近平派系“之江新军”的主要成员之一。
description.en: Zhong Shaojun is widely considered by the public to be a key member of Xi Jinping's political faction, the "New Zhijiang Army."

relationships.target: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会
中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 钟绍军当选为中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会代表及主席团成员。
description.en: Zhong Shaojun was elected as a delegate and a member of the presidium of the 19th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 钟绍军当选为第十三届全国人民代表大会中国人民解放军代表。
description.en: Zhong Shaojun was elected as a deputy from the People's Liberation Army to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 钟绍军接替秦生祥出任中央军事委员会办公厅主任。
description.en: Zhong Shaojun succeeded Qin Shengxiang as the Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 方永祥接替钟绍军出任中央军事委员会办公厅主任。
description.en: Fang Yongxiang succeeded Zhong Shaojun as the Director of the General Office of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 钟绍军接替吴志铭（中央军委主席胡锦涛办公室主任）出任新设立的中央军委主席习近平办公室主任。
description.en: Zhong Shaojun succeeded Wu Zhiming (Director of the Office of CMC Chairman Hu Jintao) to become the director of the newly established Office of CMC Chairman Xi Jinping.

position.zh-cn: 中央军委主席办公室主任
position.en: Director of the Office of the Chairman of the Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 吴志铭担任时任中央军委主席胡锦涛的办公室主任。
description.en: Wu Zhiming served as the Director of the Office for the then-CMC Chairman Hu Jintao.
